verses.verse: And <S%H1212>Bezalel<s%> and <S%H171>Oholiab<s%> shall <S%H6213>work<s%>, and <S%H2450>every<s%> <S%H3820>wise-hearted<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, in <S%H1992>whom<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H8394>understanding<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> how to <S%H6213>work<s%> all the <S%H4399>work<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, according to all that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1212>Bezalel<s%> and <S%H171>Oholiab<s%>, and <S%H2450>every<s%> <S%H3820>wise-hearted<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, in whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, even every one whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> stirred him <S%H5375>up<s%> to <S%H7126>come<s%> unto the <S%H4399>work<s%> to do <S%H6213>it<s%>:

and they <S%H3947>received<s%> <S%H6440>of<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> all the <S%H8641>offering<s%> which the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H935>brought<s%> for the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, wherewith to <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H935>it<s%>. And they brought yet unto him <S%H5071>freewill-offerings<s%> every <S%H1242>morning<s%>.

And all the wise <S%H2450>men<s%>, that <S%H6213>wrought<s%> all the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, <S%H935>came<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> from his <S%H4399>work<s%> which they <S%H6213>wrought<s%>;

and they <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> much <S%H7235>more<s%> than <S%H1767>enough<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4399>work<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> gave <S%H6680>commandment<s%>, and they caused it to be <S%H6963>proclaimed<s%> throughout the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Let neither <S%H376>man<s%> nor <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> any more <S%H4399>work<s%> for the <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>. So the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H3607>restrained<s%> from <S%H935>bringing<s%>.
For the <S%H4399>stuff<s%> they had was <S%H1767>sufficient<s%> for all the <S%H4399>work<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3498>it<s%>, and too much.

And all the <S%H2450>wise-hearted<s%> <S%H3820>men<s%> among them that <S%H6213>wrought<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> with <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%>; of fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>, and <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%>, with <S%H3742>cherubim<s%>, the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H2803>skilful<s%> <S%H6213>workman<s%>, Bezalel made them.

The <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> was <S%H8083>eight<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>: all the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> had <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure<s%>.

And he <S%H2266>coupled<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> to <S%H259>another<s%>: and the other <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> he <S%H2266>coupled<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> to <S%H259>another<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%> upon the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> from the <S%H7098>selvedge<s%> in the <S%H4225>coupling<s%>: likewise he <S%H6213>made<s%> in the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that was <S%H7020>outmost<s%> in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H4225>coupling<s%>.

Fifty <S%H2572><s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he in the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%>, and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he in the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that was in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H4225>coupling<s%>: the <S%H3924>loops<s%> were <S%H6901>opposite<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> to <S%H259>another<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H7165>clasps<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H2266>coupled<s%> the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> to <S%H259>another<s%> with the <S%H7165>clasps<s%>: so the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> was <S%H259>one<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of <S%H5795>goats<s%>' hair for a <S%H168>tent<s%> over the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>: <S%H6249>eleven<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> he made <S%H6213>them<s%>.

The <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%>: the <S%H6249>eleven<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> had <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure<s%>.
And he <S%H2266>coupled<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> by <S%H8337>themselves<s%>, and six curtains by <S%H3407>themselves<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that was <S%H7020>outmost<s%> in the <S%H4225>coupling<s%>, and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he upon the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> which was outmost in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2279>coupling<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H7165>clasps<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> to <S%H2266>couple<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H2266>together<s%>, that it might be <S%H259>one<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4372>covering<s%> for the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H352>rams<s%>' <S%H5785>skins<s%> dyed <S%H119>red<s%>, and a <S%H4372>covering<s%> <S%H8476>of<s%> <S%H5785>sealskins<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, standing <S%H5975>up<s%>.

Ten <S%H6235><s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> of a <S%H7175>board<s%>, and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%>.

Each <S%H259><s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons<s%>, <S%H7947>joined<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H259>another<s%>: thus did he <S%H6213>make<s%> for all the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>: <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H8486>southward<s%>;

and he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> under the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%>; <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> for its <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> for its <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons<s%>.
And for the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%>,

and their <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>; <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%>.
And for the <S%H3411>hinder<s%> part of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%>.
And <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he for the <S%H4742>corners<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> in the hinder <S%H3411>part<s%>.

And they were <S%H8382>double<s%> <S%H4295>beneath<s%>; and in <S%H8382>like<s%> <S%H3162>manner<s%> they were entire unto the <S%H7218>top<s%> thereof unto <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2885>ring<s%>: thus he <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H8147>both<s%> of them in the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4740>corners<s%>.

And there were <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%>, and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%>; under <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>; <S%H2568>five<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>,

and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> for the hinder <S%H3411>part<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H8484>middle<s%> <S%H1280>bar<s%> to <S%H1272>pass<s%> <S%H8432>through<s%> in the midst of the <S%H7175>boards<s%> from the one <S%H7097>end<s%> to the <S%H7097>other<s%>.

And he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> their <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for <S%H1004>places<s%> for the <S%H1280>bars<s%>, and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> the <S%H1280>bars<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%>, and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>: with <S%H3742>cherubim<s%>, the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H2803>skilful<s%> <S%H6213>workman<s%>, made he it.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> thereunto <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%>, and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold<s%>: their <S%H2053>hooks<s%> were of <S%H2091>gold<s%>: and he <S%H3332>cast<s%> for them <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4539>screen<s%> for the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%>, of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%>, and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>, the work of the <S%H7551>embroiderer<s%>;

and the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of it with their <S%H2053>hooks<s%>: and he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> their <S%H7218>capitals<s%> and their <S%H2838>fillets<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%>; and their <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> were of <S%H5178>brass<s%>.
